alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:43AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1142 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 17 miles northwest of Currie, moving north northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Ruby Valley, Cherry Creek, Oasis, Ruby Lake, Currie, Clover Valley, Deeth, Pequop Summit, Angel Lake, Moor Summit, Secret Pass, Harrison Pass, Lamoille Canyon, Overland Pass, Franklin Lake, Big Bald Mountain and Star Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
